TextView.android:text:
Present
Used to describe present activities or general facts, routines, situations etc.
Example: # I _work_ in a factory.
Present continuous
Generally used to refer to actions that are happening at the moment of speaking.
Example: # I _am eating_.
Simple past
Used when talking about things that happened in the past and are now finished.
Example: # When I was young I _had_ a dog.
Past perfect
Used for describing actions that happened in the past before another action.
Example: # I _had studied_ dutch before the exam.
Conditional
Used for describing hypothetical situations.
Example: # I _would learn_ dutch but I find it too hard.
Conditional perfect
Used to refer to hypothetical situations in the past.
Example: # We _woudln't have missed_ the concert if we had taken a taxi.
Future
Used to express actions that will happen in a time 'later than now'.
Example: # I _will learn_ dutch.
